comment.author: 26220432@N06
comment._content:
** translation of describtion **

Second World War, landwar Eastern Front. German shocktroops are carefully walking through tall grass. Russia/Soviet Union, November 7th 1941

comment.author: 78705066@N00
comment._content: Waffen SS troops in their distinctive camouflage smocks - at this early stage of the war only used by these units.

comment.author: 14673419@N00
comment._content:
Übersetzung:
Zweite Weltkrieg, Ostfront. Deutsche Stosstruppen gehen behutsam durch das hoge Gras

comment.author: 37324043@N00
comment._content:
Second World War, landwar Eastern Front. German shocktroops are carefully walking through tall grass. Russia/Soviet Union, November 7th 1941

RUS:

Вторая Мировая, восточный фронт. Ударные войска немцев. Отряд идет по полю сквозь высокую траву. СССР\Россия. 7 ноября 1941.

comment._content: turkveil thanks for sharing. I really enjoy your knowledge of the 'details'.

comment.author: 38882663@N08
comment._content: It seems it is southern part of the Eastern front - on the 7 november 1941 it was snowfall in Moscow.....
